channel.title: Huiki Haere
channel.desc: In this action-packed episode, the Maipi/Paenga wh?nau and the Rupuha/Ripikoi sisters dive into a trio of high-energy sports. They take on the challenge of riding the artificial waves of the Flowrider, strap on skates for a fast-paced and full-contact Roller Derby session, and then step into the ring for conditioning, wrestling drills, and insider tips with the crew from Aotearoa Wrestling. (R).

channel.desc: PREMIERE: At the top of South Island, from Golden Bay to the Marlborough Sounds, a community of M?ori are fighting to maintain their way of life and a connection to the sea that was passed down to them from their t?puna. channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Toa Hunter Gatherer
channel.desc: Adventurer Owen Boynton presents a holistic view of gathering kai as he travels the country to meet like-minded kaitiaki and outdoor experts. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tui Teka's Trail
channel.desc: Tui saddles up starter horse Arthur for the first time then heads to Gisborne to see Jenny whose horse suffers from separation anxiety. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tales From Zambia
channel.desc: Explore Zambia's diverse wildlife, from majestic elephants to playful baboons, through this captivating collection. Venture into breathtaking habitats and witness fascinating animal behaviours. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Hunt With Me
channel.desc: Nore Martin and Martin Cleave are in heaven on the Hauraki Gulf; Hemi Hawkins is surrounded by deer in the Kaikoura forest. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Feral
channel.desc: NEW: From wild hog hunting to silver carp fishing, adventure-loving culinary explorer Via Vang is ready to chase, kill, cook, and eat all the crazy creatures that have overstayed their welcome.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Rewind
channel.desc: Music video series with curated NZ and Reo M?ori music. Includes old music videos updated with graphic factoids. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Hunting Aotearoa
channel.desc: Join skilled hunter-gatherer Peter Peeti, for another exciting hunting season. Pete is in the Tasman region, with a group of teenagers who are learning how to hunt and provide for their families. (R).[(96057)]
